channel.title: Critical-Thinking on Ctrl+Alt+Dark
channel.description: Recent content in Critical-Thinking on Ctrl+Alt+Dark

item.title: Learning in the AI Era - Part 1: The Curiosity Crisis
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: AI isn’t making us stupider, our curiosity has been atrophying for years and AI just makes it visible. Learn why curiosity is a muscle you can rebuild and how to use AI as an amplifier, not a crutch.
